issue.title: [Website][Release] Version JSON files not updated in release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16560](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16560). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-15366 added a script to automatically increment the version switchers for the docs, which was updated as part of the changes in ARROW-15555.  However, the latest release did not increment the version numbers (and ARROW-15555 changes the script to update on snapshots instead of releases - could be the reason for it not happening?)
